scripts.build-docz: mkdir -p build && yarn clean-docz && yarn pre-build-docz && docz build
scripts.build-lib-debug: export NODE_ENV=development && yarn pre-build-lib && npx rollup -c && yarn post-build-lib && cp ./README.md lib/
scripts.build-lib-dev: export NODE_ENV=development && yarn pre-build-lib && yarn post-build-lib && npx rollup -c --watch
scripts.build-lib: export NODE_ENV=production && export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192 && yarn pre-build-lib && npx rollup -c && yarn post-build-lib && cp ./README.md lib/
scripts.build-storybook: mkdir -p build && yarn clean-storybook && yarn pre-build-storybook && build-storybook -s ./public -o ./build/storybook
scripts.chromatic: export STORYBOOK_URL=https://phorkit.phork.org && export STORYBOOK_THEME_ID=light && npx chromatic
scripts.gen-types: npx tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json --emitDeclarationOnly && npx tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.link-lib: yarn unlink && yarn build-lib && cd lib && yarn link && cd -
scripts.post-build-lib: yarn gen-lib-package && yarn gen-lib-index && yarn gen-lib-config && yarn gen-types
scripts.pre-build-lib: yarn build-icons && yarn gen-postcss-json && yarn gen-component-info
scripts.rebase-develop: git checkout main && git pull && git checkout develop && git rebase main
